name: Ancient Wasteland Dragon
movement: burrow 30 ft., climb 40 ft., fly 80 ft., walk 40 ft.
description: The Ancient Wasteland Dragon is a massive dragon with a blend of chaotic evil qualities, characterized by its powerful frame and a fearsome presence in battle.
memorable: Its imposing size and devastating Warped Energy Breath make it a daunting opponent, along with its ability to instill fear through its Frightful Presence.
goals: To dominate its territory and instill fear among those who challenge it.
relations: Related to other dragons, potentially serving as a master to lesser draconic creatures or evil beings.
environment: Typically found in desolate wastelands or ruined landscapes.
strengths: High Constitution and Charisma, powerful melee and breath attacks, and Legendary Resistance enhancing its survivability.
weaknesses: A low Dexterity score making it somewhat sluggish compared to more agile opponents.
attacks: Utilizes multiattack options, including a bite, two claw strikes, and a powerful tail swipe that can knock enemies prone.
most_powerful_ability: Warped Energy Breath deals massive area force damage in a 90-foot line, capable of significantly altering the tide of battle.
senses: It has blindsight up to 60 feet and a passive Perception score of 19, making it highly aware of its surroundings.
skills: Proficient in Perception and Stealth, with a notably high passive Perception score.
additional_information: Immune to force damage, adding to its resilience.
Can instill fear in creatures within a large radius through Frightful Presence.
Possesses powerful melee attacks with significant damage outputs.
Able to utilize legendary actions for tactical advantages in combat.
Counts as an extremely high-level threat designed for experienced parties.
